history.proof: intros x y H. unfold ex_Rbar_plus in *. unfold Rbar_plus'. destruct (Rbar_plus' x y) eqn:E. - shelve. - contradiction H.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall x y : Rbar, ex_Rbar_plus x y -> ex_Rbar_plus y x

Premises:
ex_Rbar_plus = fun x y : Rbar => match Rbar_plus' x y with | Some _ => True | None => False end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
Inductive Rbar : Set := Finite : R -> Rbar | p_infty : Rbar | m_infty : Rbar For Finite: Argument scope is [R_scope]
Rbar_plus_correct : forall x y : Rbar, ex_Rbar_plus x y -> is_Rbar_plus x y (Rbar_plus x y)
ex_Rbar_minus = fun x y : Rbar => ex_Rbar_plus x (Rbar_opp y) : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
Rbar_le_antisym : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_le y x -> x = y
Rbar_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le x y
Rbar_lt_not_eq : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> x <> y
Rbar_le_not_lt : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le y x -> ~ Rbar_lt x y
Rbar_not_le_lt : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y x
Rbar_not_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y x
Rbar_lt_not_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt y x -> ~ Rbar_le x y
Rbar_mult_correct : forall x y : Rbar, ex_Rbar_mult x y -> is_Rbar_mult x y (Rbar_mult x y)
Rbar_mult_correct' : forall x y z : Rbar, is_Rbar_mult x y z -> ex_Rbar_mult x y
Rbar_lt_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_le_lt_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_lt_le_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_le_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_le y z -> Rbar_le x z
is_Rbar_plus_unique : forall x y z : Rbar, is_Rbar_plus x y z -> Rbar_plus x y = z
is_Rbar_mult_unique : forall x y z : Rbar, is_Rbar_mult x y z -> Rbar_mult x y = z
Rbar_plus'_comm : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_plus' x y = Rbar_plus' y x
Rbar_le_lt_or_eq_dec : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> {Rbar_lt x y} + {x = y}
Rbar_opp_eq : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_opp x = Rbar_opp y < -> x = y
Rbar_lt_le_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_lt x y} + {Rbar_le y x}
Rbar_le_lt_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_le x y} + {Rbar_lt y x}
Rbar_opp_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le (Rbar_opp x) (Rbar_opp y) < -> Rbar_le y x
Rbar_opp_lt : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt (Rbar_opp x) (Rbar_opp y) < -> Rbar_lt y x
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove_2 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x y : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), x <> y -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y s -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove x s)
Rbar_total_order : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_lt x y} + {x = y} + {Rbar_lt y x}
f_equal_R : forall (B : Type) (f : R -> B) (x y : R), x = y -> f x = f y
is_finite_correct : forall x : Rbar, is_finite x < -> (exists y : R, x = y)
Rbar_lt_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_lt x y} + {~ Rbar_lt x y}
Rbar_le_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_le x y} + {~ Rbar_le x y}
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove_1 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x y : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), x = y -> ~ FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove x s)
Rbar_finite_neq : forall x y : R, x <> y < -> x <> y
Rbar_finite_eq : forall x y : R, x = y < -> x = y
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove_3 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x y : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove x s) -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y s
cadd_ext : forall (C : Type) (cadd cmul : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceq : C -> C -> Prop), ring_eq_ext cadd cmul copp ceq -> forall x y : C, ceq x y -> forall x0 y0 : C, ceq x0 y0 -> ceq (cadd x x0) (cadd y y0)
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); ARdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req (rm...
Rbar_eq_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {x = y} + {x <> y}
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.Dec.F.remove_iff : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x y : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove x s) < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y s /\ x <> y
is_Rbar_mult = fun x y z : Rbar => Rbar_mult' x y = Some z : Rbar -> Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
is_Rbar_plus = fun x y z : Rbar => Rbar_plus' x y = Some z : Rbar -> Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop

```coq
intros x y H.
unfold ex_Rbar_plus in *.
unfold Rbar_plus'.
destruct (Rbar_plus' x y) eqn:E.
- exact I.
- contradiction H.
Qed.```
